channel.title: Homes on Ayman A. Amin
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Ayman A. Amin

item.description: Background I have been working as an Assistant Professor of Statistics (since September 2015) at Faculty of Commerce, Menoufia University, Egypt. Before that, I worked as a Tutor for Statistics and Mathematics from February 2012 to June 2014 at Faculty of Science, Engineering and Technology, Swinburne University of Technology, Australia. Moreover, I worked as a Teaching Assistant for Statistics and Mathematics from May 2007 to April 2010 at Faculty of Commerce, Menoufia University, Egypt.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I teach the following courses for undergraduate students: Applied Mathematics. Principles of Statistics. Applied Statistics. Quantitative Analysis. I teach the following courses for Postgraduate students: Advanced Statistics Theory of Statistics Mathematics for Statisticians Demography Time Series Analysis
